segments.text: Have you seen the sales report for last quarter ? Who do you think is our digest threat ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: From the numbers , it seems like Forest Inc . is our digest competitor ... Le'Ban and Markford are also major contenders in our market .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Le'Ban is the new kid on the block , it's amazing they've had such tremendous success so soon ... With them on the scene , the competition is outthrough .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: here's information about our competitor's recent market activities ...
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thanks , this will be a big help in putting together next quarter's marketing strategies . With competition this intense , we'll have to step up production even more . We need a price we can compete with .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We're in a very competitive environment . It's sink or saimin this market .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Better start swimming ! we've got to find a way to outsmart the other guys . I want a preliminarily strategic marketing plan on my desk by next Tuesday ... the competition never sleeps and neither should we .
segments.speaker: S1
